summary: An Argentinian Dutch and Latin Comedy Drama where a young naive girl Marcia (Tatiana Saphir) learns about her sexuality. Marcia is kidnapped by 2 punk women Mao (Carla Crespo)& Veronica ... See full summary »
cast: Tatiana Saphir|Carla Crespo|Veronica Hassan|Beatriz Thibaudin|María Merlino|Marcos Ferrante|Ana María Martínez|Susana Pampín|Luis Herrera|Laura Mantel
title: Tan de repente
